Billing Details

First Name
First Name is required.
First Name must be an alphabates.
Last Name
Last Name is required.
Last Name must be an alphabates.
Phone
Phone No is required.
Phone No is must be number.
Email Address
Email is required
Invalid Email
Country
Country is required
Address
Address is required
Maximum 50 character
Town/City
City is required
State
State is required
Postal Code
Postalcode is required
